title: Bear Attack on Bitcoin Frightening, But Not Break the Trend
description: Market Overview The crypto market is clearly struggling to move upwards, as historic highs are also attracting sellers. On Friday morning, the total capitalisation of cryptocurrencies stood at $4.03 trillion, reflecting a 3.4% decline over 24 hours. title: Crypto group backed by Trump sons hunts for bitcoin companies in Asia
description: Donald Trump Jr and Eric Trump look to make inroads in region with enthusiasm for digital assets

title: Crypto Crash Liquidates $1B in BTC, ETH Positions on Inflation Data
description: On August 14, 2025, a crypto market crash liquidated over $1 billion in leveraged positions, primarily long bets on Bitcoin and Ethereum, triggered by U.S. inflation data. A whale trader lost $83 million on a 50x ETH position. This event highlights leverage risks and potential for market rebounds if speculation eases.
